channel.title: Posts on Xue Chao's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Xue Chao's Blog

item.title: 3rdArtical
item.description: 3rd test FAR out in the ocean, where the water is as blue as the prettiest cornflower, and as clear as crystal, it is very, very deep; so deep, indeed, that no cable could fathom it: many church steeples, piled one upon another, would not reach from the ground beneath to the surface of the water above. There dwell the Sea King and his subjects. We must not imagine that there is nothing at the bottom of the sea but bare yellow sand.

item.title: 2ndArtical
item.description: 第二篇博客 test cool FAR out in the ocean, where the water is as blue as the prettiest cornflower, and as clear as crystal, it is very, very deep; so deep, indeed, that no cable could fathom it: many church steeples, piled one upon another, would not reach from the ground beneath to the surface of the water above. There dwell the Sea King and his subjects. We must not imagine that there is nothing at the bottom of the sea but bare yellow sand.

item.title: 利用Star-CCM+的Design Manager来进行扫描计算
item.description: 介绍 在Star-CCM+的新的版本中增加了一个非常好用的功能————Design Manager。 应用场景 研究发现 对策 结论
